content.rendered:
Terms & Conditions

01 Introduction

Welcome to Pixellkey. By using our website and services, you agree to comply with the following terms and conditions. If you do not agree, please refrain from using our services.

02 Services Offered

Pixellkey provides branding, marketing, social media management, and digital marketing solutions. The scope of work, timelines, and deliverables will be agreed upon in a written proposal before initiating any project.

03 Payment Terms

Payments must be made as per the agreed-upon plan.
Delays in payments may result in a pause or termination of services.
No refunds will be provided once work has commenced.

 

.

04 Client Responsibilities

Clients must provide accurate information, approvals, and necessary content for smooth project execution. Any delays in client responses may affect project timelines.
.

05 Intellectual Property

All designs, campaigns, and marketing materials created by Pixellkey remain our property until full payment is received. Once paid in full, the rights will be transferred to the client.

 

06 Confidentiality

Both parties agree to keep confidential any proprietary information shared during the project.

07 Limitation of Liability

Pixellkey will not be responsible for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use of our services.
.

08 Termination

Either party may terminate services with a prior written notice. Any work completed before termination will be billed accordingly.

 

09 Amendments

Pixellkey reserves the right to update these terms at any time. Continued use of services implies acceptance of any changes.

elevate your brand with our marketing solutions

chat with us
